alert.note: Alert for Ashley (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 4:27PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Ashley County through 545 PM CDT... At 427 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Urbana, or 15 miles northwest of Huttig, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... West Crossett around 505 PM CDT. Crossett and North Crossett around 510 PM CDT. Berlin around 530 PM CDT. Wilmot around 545 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Blanchton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for southeastern Arkansas.
